document.full_text: the los angeles kings blew a four-goal lead and lost 6-5 in overtime to the san jose sharks in the first round of the nhl playoffs on tuesday, while chicago routed vancouver 7-2 to keep their series alive.
document.title: kings squander lead as sharks rally; hawks still alive
lines_and_colors: the los angeles kings blew a four-goal lead and lost 6-5 in overtime to the san jose sharks in the first round of the nhl playoffs on tuesday, while chicago routed vancouver 7-2 to keep their series alive.
